query:
SELECT s.id, s.tag, l.legId, l.optionType, l.strike, l.quantity, l.tradePrice 
FROM structures s 
JOIN JSON_TABLE(s.legs, '$[*]' COLUMNS(
  legId INT PATH '$.id',
  optionType VARCHAR(10) PATH '$.optionType',
  strike DECIMAL(10,2) PATH '$.strike',
  quantity INT PATH '$.quantity',
  tradePrice DECIMAL(10,2) PATH '$.tradePrice'
)) l
WHERE s.tag = 'LS76';
